          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A görög írás</string>
            <string language="en">The Greek writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das griechische Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'écriture grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escrita grega</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scrittura greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ελληνικό γράψιμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La escritura griega</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A görög írás - szavak összeállítása betűkből</string>
            <string language="en">The Greek writing - Words are compiled from characters</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">görög írás, írás, görög</string>
            <string language="en">Greek writing, writing, greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das griechische Schreiben - Wörter werden von 
den Zeichen kompiliert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'écriture grecque - des mots sont compilés des 
caractères</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escrita grega - as palavras são compiladas dos
caráteres</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scrittura greca - le parole sono compilate dai 
caratteri</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Έλληνας που γράφει - οι λέξεις μεταγλωττίζονται από
τους χαρακτήρες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La escritura griega - las palabras se compilan de
caracteres</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisches Schreiben, Schreiben, griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture grecque, écriture, grecque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita grega, escrita, grega</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura greca, scrittura, greca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικό γράψιμο, γράψιμο, ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escritura griega, escritura, griega</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
